com.pos.device.icc

Class IccReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.icc.IccReader

  • public final class IccReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is used to operate the IC Card.

    Generally, you can get the instance of IccReader by getInstance(SlotType type). We provide the slot type defined in class SlotType. 

     ...
 // An example for using IC Card.
 
    
 // To get the instance by slot type, here we use SlotType.USER_CARD.
 IccReader iccReader = IccReader.getInstance(SlotType.USER_CARD);
 ...
 
    
 // To search the IC Card.
 iccReader.startSearchCard(30 * 1000, new IccReaderCallback() {
 public void onSearchResult(int result) {
 if (result == IccReaderCallback.SUCCESS) {
 // Add code here...
 ...
 try {
 // Power up IC Card and connect it.
 ContactCard card = iccReader.connectCard(VCC.VOLT_5, OperatorMode.EMV_MODE);
 // The APDU command.
 byte[] cmdApdu = {0x00, (byte) 0xA4, 0x04, 0x00, 0x08, (byte) 0xA0, 0x00, 0x00, 0x03, 0x33, 0x01, 0x01, 0x01, 0x00};
 // Transmit the command between IC Card reader and card.
 byte[] rspData = iccReader.transmit(card, cmdApdu);
 } catch (SDKException e) {
 e.printStackTrace();
 }
 ...
 }
 }
 });
 
    
 ...
    Author:
    Created by Paddy on 2016/9/19 15:36

      • getInstance

        public static IccReader getInstance(SlotType slot)
        Get the IC Card reader instance by slot type
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot type.
        Returns:
        Return the special reader instance.

      • isCardPresent

        public boolean isCardPresent()
        Check the IC Card is present or not in slot.
        Returns:
        Return true if the IC Card is present in slot else false.

      • connectCard

        public ContactCard connectCard(VCC vcc,
                      OperatorMode mode)
                        throws SDKException
        To make establish connection between reader and IC Card. the IC Card in present will be powered up with the voltage vcc and mode.
        Parameters:
        vcc - The voltage powered up.
        mode - The operation mode powered up.
        Returns:
        Return the ContactCard instance if success else null.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • connectCard

        public ContactCard connectCard(VCC vcc,
                      OperatorMode mode,
                      SpeedMode speedMode)
                        throws SDKException
        To make establish connection between reader and IC Card. the IC Card in present will be powered up with the voltage vcc and mode.
        Parameters:
        vcc - The voltage powered up.
        mode - The operation mode powered up.
        speedMode - the speed mode powered up.
        Returns:
        Return the ContactCard instance if success else null.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • disconnectCard

        public void disconnectCard()
        Disconnect the ICCard and ICCard reader, power down the card.

      • startSearchCard

        public void startSearchCard(int timeoutMs,
                   IccReaderCallback iccReaderCallback)
                     throws SDKException
        To search the IC Card in timeout range, the result will be told by IccReaderCallback.onSearchResult(int)
        Parameters:
        timeoutMs - The timeout(milliseconds) spent to search IC Card, if the timeout <= 0, it presents that will not be timeout in searching card instead of canceled by user.
        iccReaderCallback - The callback of result.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • stopSearchCard

        public void stopSearchCard()
                    throws SDKException
        To stop search card.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • transmit

        public ResponseApdu transmit(ContactCard contactCard,
                    CommandApdu command)
                      throws SDKException
        Send the APDU command to the contacted IC card and receive the response data form card.
        Parameters:
        contactCard - the contacted card instance.
        command - the APDU command instance to send the card.
        Returns:
        returns the response data from IC card if success else return null.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • transmit

      • release

        public void release()
        To release the IC card resources finally if you do't use the card.

        Call this method will close the device file descriptor of IC card.

        Returns:
        true:Success; false: failed.

        Parameters:

      • sleCardAuthenticate

        public boolean sleCardAuthenticate(IccReader.SLECardType type,
                          byte[] password)
        Authenticate the user password of sle4442 card or sle4428 card
        Parameters:
        type - The type of SLE Card
        password - password, SLE4442 card is 3bytes,SLE4428 card is 2bytes
        Returns:
        true:Success; false: failed.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        type - The type of SLE Card
        address - the address of protect memory
        Returns:
